name: Concentrating
description:
The way to play the game is very simple: use the ← and → keys to move the ball, and the springboard will bounce the ball higher and higher as it continuously moves upward until it reaches the moon! Choosing a difficulty level that challenges you will make you sweat a little and help you concentrate better.

By playing this game, you can quickly clear your mind and be focused. Choose difficulty that suits you, and play for about 1-2 minutes, you would be quickly prepared for study and work.
